intro: Ludwigia irregularis, commonly known as the red Ludwigia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Onagraceae. The plant is characterized by its striking red or orange flowers, which are borne on slender, branching stems. Ludwigia irregularis is often cultivated as an ornamental plant in water gardens and pond settings due to its vibrant appearance and ease of care.
